Reviews.Content: New budget hotel in good location A new-built budget hotel, mostly teenagers. Subway station in front of the door, 2 stops from Alexanderplatz (center of former East-Berlin). Offers shared rooms or you can get the whole room for yourself for a higher price. The building has elevators and en-suite bathrooms. Pillows are synthetic fabric, you might want to bring your own.
Reviews.Author: phil608

Reviews.Content: Questo albergo si trova nel...   showReview(20387165, 'full');
